title: Eloy
description:
Eloy - Time to turn

Digitally remastered 2005
Released by EMI with \"Copy controlled\" logo 7243 5 63777 2 1 (UK 5637 772)

Playback by Pioneer PD-91
Recorded through optical input on Razer Barracuda AC-1 by Audacity for Win32 1.2.6.
Converted from dual channel 32-bit PCM to FLAC by dBpoweramp

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ID3

Artist:     Eloy
Album:      Time to turn [Digitally remastered]
Year:       2005
Genre:      Progressive Rock
Comment:    Recording date Aug 1981-Feb 1982. Original (p) 1982, Digital Remaster (p) 2005 with \"Copy Controlled\" protection. Playback on Pioneer PD-91, optical output. Recorded through Razer Barracuda AC-1 optical input by Audacity for Win32 1.2.6.(http://audacity.sourceforge.net/) Converted from dual channel, 32-bit PCM to FLAC by dBpoweramp (http://www.illustrate.com/)
Copyright:  2005 Capitol Music, a division of EMI Music Germany GmbH & Co. KG Im Mediapark 8a, 50670 KÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¶ln

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Razer can be found at http://www.razerzone.com/
Audacity can be found at http://audacity.sourceforge.net/
dBpoweramp can be found at http://www.dbpoweramp.com/professional.htm

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: the record is of good quality, remastering is nice. The EMI record is Copy controlled, which is evidently bad for playback on many kinds of devices. With my equipment, ripping failed or produced the famous polluted rips that are the product of the copy protection. There is no reason for ripping and publishing this material, except the fact that EMI chose to rip off its customers by packaging the media as a CD, while the disc itself is not conformant to the Red Book.

Note that you should be able to return a purchased disc to the shop with a full refound.

Enjoy.
